Mendokusai

Tartarus

Mendokusai

08 Dec 2017

Mendokusai is one of my favourite words. It's Japanese, and means "how troublesome" and/or "I can't be bothered". I like it both because it concisely encapsulates a certain feeling and also because it it a phonetically beautiful word to me.
